amendment.description: To prohibit the establishment of new military commissions after December 31, 2011.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5104 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 257.

action.text: Amendment SA 5104 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S10385-10390, S10397-10398; text: CR S10385) To prohibit the establishment of new military commissions after December 31, 2011.
